description: '''Francisco de Jes√∫s Rivera Figueras''' (born 4 June 1948), known as '''Paquito D'Rivera''', is a Cuban-American [[alto saxophonist]], [[clarinet]]ist and composer. He was a member of the Cuban [[songo music|songo]] band [[Irakere]] and, since the 1980s, he has established himself as a bandleader in the United States. His smooth saxophone tone and his frequent combination of [[Latin jazz]] and [[classical music]] have become his trademarks.
